songs.title: Show Me The Money
songs.lyrics:
Show me the money
I know you want it
‘Cuz everybody does
‘Cuz everybody does my child

A little bit of green
Never hurt nobody
A little bit of green
Yeah!

Show me the money
Show me the money
Show me the money
Show me the money
Show me the money
Show me the money
Show me the money
Show me the money or you ain’t got no shit!

No, no motherfucker no you ain’t got no shit!
